projects.title: Travelers Mobile
projects.description: The Travelers mobile application is a React Native based application leveraging AWS and on-prem infrastructure.

projects.title: Noggle Boggle Trivia and Quiz Generator
projects.description: The Noggle Boggle Trivia and Quiz Generator is a websocket backend service that can be paired with a third party UI to genearte and drive trivia games or quizzes.

projects.title: Single Plant Irrigation System (SPIS)
projects.description: Christopher Lukas, Brent Baade and Daniel Seskey completed the Single Plant Irrigation System as a project for the Embedded Systems Course at the University of Pittsburgh.

projects.title: Photography Portfolio
